revised_title: PVT Properties of Water: Liquid Water in the Range 150-350°C from Saturation to 1 Kbar
tldr: This study measures the density of liquid water in the range of 150-350°C and from saturation to 1 kbar using an advanced experimental apparatus. The research provides accurate density measurements with a precision of 50-100 parts per million, contributing to a better understanding of water's properties under various conditions.
